body_html: Hi @dave-andersen I already singed the CLA. The docs are now in MarkDown and godoc, I added a template here to generate the documentation from the source code comments in MarkDown, the result is here. Run go generate creates this MarkDown.
body_text: Hi @dave-andersen I already singed the CLA. The docs are now in MarkDown and godoc, I added a template here to generate the documentation from the source code comments in MarkDown, the result is here. Run go generate creates this MarkDown.
body: Hi @dave-andersen I already singed the CLA. The docs are now in MarkDown and godoc, I added a template [here](https://github.com/alonsovidales/tensorflow/tree/go_bindings_tensors/tensorflow/contrib/go/godoc_tmpl) to generate the documentation from the source code comments in MarkDown, the result is [here](https://github.com/alonsovidales/tensorflow/tree/go_bindings_tensors/tensorflow/contrib/go/g3doc). Run `go generate` creates this MarkDown.
